TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Can be obtained from https://telegram.dog/BotFather/

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: Your Postgres SQL DataBase URI, Get one from ElephantSQL.com

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: The Telegram Support Group Where Users of your Bot can Go and ask their Questions. This MUST NOT be pointing towards TangentChats

EVENT_LOGS.description: Event logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

JOIN_LOGGER.description: A channel where bot will print who added it to what group, useful during debugging or spam handling.

CASH_API_KEY.description: Required for currency converter. Get yours from https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key

TIME_API_KEY.description: Required for timezone information. Get yours from https://timezonedb.com/api

DEV_USERS.description: Enter the IDs of the users who are the Developers of the Bot And dont delete this id , then keep the IDs as they are and add yours

SPAMWATCH_API.description: Spamwatch API Token, Get one from @SpamWatchBot.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

DRAGONS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users And dont delete this Id.

DEMONS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who can use Gban From Your Bot And Dont delete this id

TIGERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who can not be banned by your Bot

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Go to this site https://www.remove.bg/api#remove-background. Get your api key

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks.

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks. Better to leave it Empty

NO_LOAD.description: List of Modules that are not be Loaded

BL_CHATS.description: List of chats you want blacklisted.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /. Recommended is True

DONATION_LINK.description: Optional: link where you would like to receive donations. If you are a noob, better leave it linking to paul

DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.

AI_API_KEY.description: Make your bot talk using Intellivoid's chatbot API, No Need of This

BAN_STICKER.description: ID of the sticker you want to use when banning people. Keep this Empty

HEROKU_APP_NAME: Enter the Heroku app name here (Must an exact same name with your input above).
